target.name: all
target.echo: The "ant all" demonstration build has moved. Please try the following command instead: ant all -f build_demo.xml

target.name: dita-preprocess
target.depends: start-process, init-logger, init-URIResolver, output-version, check-arg, output-deprecated-msg, output-css-warn-message, preprocess

target.name: topic2tocjs
target.echo: The TocJS output type only supports ditamap files as input.

target.name: tocjsDefaultXhtmlOutput
target.depends: dita.map.xhtml, copy-revflag, copy-css , dita.topics.xhtml, dita.inner.topics.xhtml, dita.outer.topics.xhtml

target.name: dita.fo2pdf
target.description: Build PDF from FO using FOP

target.name: dita.topic.fo
target.description: Build XSL-FO output from dita topic

target.name: buildhtml
target.depends: build-init, preprocess, dita.map.xhtml, copy-revflag, copy-css , dita.topics.jqmobile, dita.inner.topics.jqmobile, dita.outer.topics.jqmobile

target.name: dita.topics.jqmobile
target.description: Build JQMobile HTML output from dita topics

target.name: dita.inner.topics.jqmobile
target.description: Build JQ Mobile HTML output from inner dita topics

target.name: dita.outer.topics.jqmobile
target.description: Build JQ Mobile HTML output from outer dita topics

target.name: buildqahtml
target.depends: build-init, preprocess, dita.map.xhtml, dita.topics.qa, dita.inner.topics.qa, dita.outer.topics.qa

target.name: dita.topics.qa
target.description: Target 1: Build QA output from dita topics

target.name: dita.inner.topics.qa
target.description: Target 2: Build QA output from inner dita topics

target.name: dita.outer.topics.qa
target.description: Target 3: Build QA output from outer dita topics

target.name: help
target.echo: Path and name of the input file.
Specify whether to output draft info. Default is "no".
File to be placed in the BODY running-footing area.
File to be placed in the BODY running-heading area.
File to be placed in the HEAD area.
Root directory for user specified CSS file.
Copy user specified CSS files. Default is "no".
Index entries should display within the body of the text itself. Default is "no".
Output file extension for generated XHTML files. Default is ".html".
XSLT file used to replace the default XSLT file.
XSLT file used to replace the default XSLT file when transforming PDF.
Determine which links are included in the ODT. Default is "none".
Root file name of the output javahelp toc file in javahelp transformation. Default is the name of the input ditamap file.
Root file name of the output javahelp map file in javahelp transformation. Default is the name of the input ditamap file.
Root file name of the output eclipsehelp toc file in eclipsehelp transformation. Default is the name of the input ditamap file.
Root file name of the output Eclipse content provider toc file in eclipsecontent transformation. Default is the name of the input ditamap file.
Extra debug information should be included in the log. Default is "no".
Use grammar pool caching when parsing dita files. Default is "yes".
Embedding images as binary data in ODT transform. Default is "yes".
Root file name of the output XHTML toc file in XHTML transformation.
DITA element names and ancestry are included in XHTML class attributes. Default is "yes".
DITA Task sections should get headings. Default is "NO".
Specify whether to output artwork filenames.
Clean the temp directory before each build. Default is "yes".
File extension name to be used in the temp directory. Default is ".xml".
Name of the file that contains the filter/flaggin/revision information.
Specify how to deal with the overflowing dita/topic files. Default is "1".
Make dita processor only resolve dita/topic files which are referenced by primary ditamap files. Default is "false".
Respond to the overflowing dita/topic files. Default is "warn".
Temporary FO file should be preserved in the output directory. Specify any value, such as "yes", to preserve the file.
Input files are validated. Default is "true".
